DOC.brief_summary: In multicenter study investigator go evaluate use six different videolaryngoscopes patient undergo elective surgery require general anesthesia intubation . The investigator hypothesize six videolaryngoscopes succeed intubation first attempt least 90 % case use difficult airway simulation extrication collar . As gold standard , standard Macintosh blade use . The study consist 6 arm . Each arm include 120 patient , sum total 720 patient .
DOC.criteria: elective surgery general anesthesia require intubation > 18years old ASA IIII know presumed difficult airway risk pulmonary aspiration refuse participate
